snippet: The champion skier Lindsey Vonn has asked the sport’s world governing body for the chance to compete against the best male ski racers in the world.
abstract: Champion women's skier Lindsey Vonn is championing sport’s world governing body for permission to compete in the men's downhill race at the World Cup season's speed opener.
lead_paragraph: The champion skier Lindsey Vonn has asked the sport’s world governing body for the chance to compete against the best male ski racers in the world.

headline.seo: Lindsey Vonn Seeks ‘One Chance’ to Race Against Men
headline.main: Vonn Seeks Chance to Race Against Men
headline.print_headline: Vonn Seeks ‘One Chance’ to Race Against Men

keywords.value: United States Ski and Snowboard Assn
keywords.name: organizations
